pages.text: Soul Stealer is an enchantment that will gather more soul essence when you kill a mob. It can be obtained by enchanting a sword or by applying an enchanted book with Soul Stealer on a sword or axe using an anvil.

Without the enchantment, killing a mob gathers 2-5 soul essence.$(br2)With Soul Stealer I, killing a mob gathers 3-6 soul essence.$(br2)With Soul Stealer II, killing a mob gathers 4-7 soul essence.$(br2)With Soul Stealer III, killing a mob gathers 5-8 soul essence.
